title: The Image of the Lost Soul
notes: Bird finds refuge by lost-soul statue; verger cages bird; bird dies; statue falls

title: Dogged
themes_other: bohemian slide; a dog as fate
notes: Timid man buys fox terrier Beelzebub at church bazaar; dog drags him into bohemian life; ends belonging to dog

title: The Blood-Feud of Toad-Water
notes: Hen raids onion bed; two families feud for years; gossip about relatives; kittens drowned; feud survives

title: New Wine in Old Bottles
themes_other: Two market women flaunt cheap self-education; weaponise big words; gossip and grudges

title: Reginald
themes_other: Narrator brings Reginald to garden party; he needles the Archdeacon’s wife; social scene derails; ends on Caspian pun

title: Reginald on Christmas Presents
themes_other: Reginald on bad gift choices; laments aunts and prayerbooks; prefers liqueurs and jewellery

title: The Saint and the Goblin
notes: Stone saint tries to help church mice; goblin’s “help” yields a coin; vergeress turns it into a mock decoration; mice stay poor

title: Reginald on the Academy
themes_other: Reginald attends the Academy for conversation; jokes about names and acquaintances; mocks slow-rising artists; thirty equals failure

title: Reginald’s Peace Poem
notes: Reginald composes a Peace poem with widgeon and hartebeest; frets over rhymes; concludes he would rather they went on with the war

title: Reginald’s Choir Treat
notes: Amabel tries to reform Reginald; he stages the choir outing as a Bacchanalian village procession with a goat; scandal follows

title: The Secret Sin of Septimus Brope
The Purple of the Balkan Kings
The Philanthropist and the Happy Cat
Clovis on the Alleged Romance of Business
